005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.net.URI;
020import java.util.List;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
024
025/**
026 * Since a node doesn't have a base URI in Metaschema, this is an alias for the
027 * document-uri function.
028 */
029public final class FnBaseUri {
030
031  @NonNull
032  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_NO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
033      .name("base-uri")
034      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
035      .deterministic()
036      .contextDependent()
037      .focusDependent()
038      .returnType(IAnyUriItem.class)
039      .returnOne()
040      .functionHandler(FnBaseUri::executeNoArg)
041      .build();
042
043  @NonNull
044  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
045      .name("base-uri")
046      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
047      .deterministic()
048      .contextIndependent()
049      .focusIndependent()
050      .argument(IArgument.builder()
051          .name("arg1")
052          .type(INodeItem.class)
053          .zeroOrOne()
054          .build())
055      .returnType(IAnyUriItem.class)
056      .returnOne()
057      .functionHandler(FnBaseUri::executeOneArg)
058      .build();
059
060  private FnBaseUri() {
061    // disable construction
062  }
063
064  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
065  @NonNull
066  private static ISequence<IAnyUriItem> executeNoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
067      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
068      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
069      IItem focus) {
070    return ISequence.of(fnBaseUri(
071        FunctionUtils.requireTypeOrNull(INodeItem.class, focus)));
072  }
073
074  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
075  @NonNull
076  private static ISequence<IAnyUriItem> executeOneArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
077      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
078      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
079      IItem focus) {
080
081    ISequence<? extends INodeItem> arg = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
082
083    INodeItem item = arg.getFirstItem(true);
084
085    return ISequence.of(fnBaseUri(item));
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Get the base URI for the provided {@code nodeItem}.
090   * <p>
091   * Based on the XPath 3.1 <a href=
092   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-base-uri">fn:base-uri</a>
093   * function.
094   *
095   * @param nodeItem
096   *          the node to get the base URI from
097   * @return the base URI, or {@code null} if the node is either null or doesn't
098   *         have a base URI
099   */
100  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.NullAssignment") // for readability
101  @Nullable
102  public static IAnyUriItem fnBaseUri(INodeItem nodeItem) {
103    IAnyUriItem retval;
104    if (nodeItem == null) {
105      retval = null; // NOPMD - intentional
106    } else {
107      URI baseUri = nodeItem.getBaseUri();
108      retval = baseUri == null ? null : IAnyUriItem.valueOf(baseUri);
109    }
110    return retval;
111  }
112}
